column4: Please someone help, what is the command in terminal to create this file: "etc/X11/xinit/xinitrc.d/mouse

check this post http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=184644 it's for an older version of ubuntu but I think it will work

read the webpage again.. it's /etc/X11/xinit/xinitrc.d/mouse  and I said use "gksudo gedit" not "sudo gedit"

nope.. just restart X but pressing ctrl+alt+backspace.. it will kill any x programs running (irc for example) and restart X
